website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, basic handheld pool vacuum that lacks the advanced features of other options.
pros: Attaches to a standard garden hose
Provides a constant supply of water to collect debris in the built-in collection bag
Easy to clean and reuse anytime you want
cons: Requires around 18 inches of water to work effectively

customer_reviews.title: It really does work!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited with this!! I wasn't really expecting it to work.... Because it was cheap in price and because we are on a well with little water pressure. We just have a little 200 or so gallon blow up pool for the grandkids but the 2 yr old loves to get in and out constantly so the bottom always had dirt and grass. This worked like a charm!! Now with a bit of Clorox (amount calculations are available online) and this vacuum I can keep water in the pool and won't be dumping and filling and running the will dry
customer_reviews.author: Sheilags

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand the mechanics behind how something so simple can do so much. It works better than the vacuum that hooks to the suction for the pool. And it's soooo much easier to deal with setting up and using. Ot dis not arrive when promised and was a little inconvenient since I wanted to use it in the weekend. I followed another's tip and put a tennis ball in the net to keep it upright while in the water. I suggest that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works if you stop trying to outsmart it. The proof is in the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I can now do my pool and vacuum it at the same time. In California we don't like to waste water so this is perfect. Previously I was using a short hose as a siphon. This is way way better. Best $20 pool and spa tool to date.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing that gave me a moment of slight panic (I'm not a pool-savvy kind of human) was that the product came in PIECES! With NO DIRECTIONS! So common sense to the rescue... I looked at photos of the vac all set up, and I figured it out! It's not that hard, really. Had to rig up a makeshift pole for the first go-round (I'm crafty like that). Doesn't come with a pool pole.. And holy King Triton, it sucked all that little crap out of my little Intex pool. Like a BOSS! I'm so glad I bought this little pool helper... Pardon me now while I go sip silly umbrella drinks in my float in my super-clean pool.
customer_reviews.author: MabryMakesArt

customer_reviews.title: Almost best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Works great aside from not getting the small particles like fine sand. It passes right through the bag. I used a stocking inside the bag to solve this problem. If it had a bag that caught fine particles then it would get 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Adapter doesn’t fit hose
customer_reviews.text: Adapter that connects the vacuum to the house was not the correct size! I thought it’d be simple to fix with a trip to the hardware store, but even if I was to get the same size diameter, the threads were way too thin to fit with anything in the plumbing, pool, or landscaping sections! Took 2 weeks to arrive. You can get a similar model at Lowe’s for $25 and it comes with an adapter that will actually fit. I don’t have a weird hose either.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha T

customer_reviews.title: It did the job exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived very quickly. I was worried that it was going to be a cheap product but the thing did exactly what I needed it to do. You just have to be careful that you don’t bang it around too much. It did the job exactly as advertised. I used a pool net pole instead of the one that came with it. The pole that came with it probably will work great in a small pool but I have a deep pebble finish pool that had sand from a roofing job at the bottom. This sucked it up in less than three minutes. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive suction giant
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, inexpensive solution for small pool owners. Unit is easy to operate and works very well. This is not going to clean as well as the units costing 5 to 8 times as much but it is a great bang for the buck. Sucked up most of the leaves and bugs on the bottom of my 15' Intex Pool.
customer_reviews.author: OogieJones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - better than my robot
customer_reviews.text: First off - those that complain about no directions are you serious??? It is simple my 7 year old put it together. Second I recommend to anyone. Yes it’s manual but wow it works awesome. I have a 18x30 pool and my robot died. Used this to clean up all firework debris in pool from shooting fireworks for 3 night. It’s amazing! Got fine to medium sized particles up. Dumped bag twice! A++
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Foster

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you...
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is absolutely fabulous! We have a small 8.5x5.5x24 pool and this worked perfectly! When I first opened it I was confused as there are no instructions but you can watch the video in the info part on how to put it together. It's super easy. I put it together in less than 2 minutes and hooked it up to the hose. You can see the video of me using it and the picture of the dirt it vacuumed up in the white sack. I was skeptical at first but after using it I'm very impressed and happy to have a clean little pool! Fantastic product for a small kid pool!
customer_reviews.author: RiMarkable

customer_reviews.title: ... a decent hot tub vacuum and this is the best!! It honestly picks up every little miniscule ...
customer_reviews.text: I've looked everywhere for a decent hot tub vacuum and this is the best!! It honestly picks up every little miniscule of sand and dirt. Although I don't use the brush part I just use the attachment that hooks onto the hose and I jump into the tub and suck up everything. The brush attachment doesn't allow me to pick up everything in the tub but does work great for our 2 foot pool that has a filter. I strongly suggest for everyone that has a hot tub!!
customer_reviews.author: Triplet Dad Ohio

customer_reviews.title: This Spa Sweeper is a Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for how simple it is. We have an uncovered 8x14' SwimSpa that is a leaf and dirt attractant (who knew?), and are very pleased with this handy little device. I am not mechanically minded, and I put it together myself in a few minutes - but it was confusing. The directions need to be much, much clearer. You just attach the hose (have the rest of the device already in the water with just the nozzle attaching part out of the water), turn it on and "vacuum". Turn off the water, remove the device, and empty the bag. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Queen

customer_reviews.title: It is Cheap But You Pay For It
customer_reviews.text: I have an intel 10’ x 30” pool. This vacuum works pretty well but only lasted one season before the plastic part that holds the water hose broke. Nevertheless for the price, I ordered a new one. I ordered 07/26, it processed 07/29 and as of today, 08/13, I still haven’t received it. I gave it one star because it did work the short time I had it. If you choose this product, I would buy two so you have a backup when the first one breaks. Your pool won’t get disgustingly dirty while you wait for the replacement. I certainly wouldn’t recommend you purchase this if you have a more expensive pool than my little $59.99 special.
customer_reviews.author: just an opinion

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I received my Pool Spa Jacuzzi Pond Mini Jet Vac Vacuum Cleaner w/ Brush, Bag, and 4' Pole today in the mail and I was stunned. 1st of all I thought someone forgot to put the instructions in the box until I realized from other post they didn't get any either. Then once I started assembling the quality of the disappointing poles were so flimsy and pathetic a 3 year old can bend the poles. This is a product that is really not worth spending any of your good money on to nothing but let your dog play catch with it. So disappointing and deceptive. I got a part that I have no clue where it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Smurph G

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and it did pick up the small debris at the bottom of the pool. It didn’t pick up everything but it did an ok job. I would say this is good for those times the pool pump/hose would just be too much of a hassle to use for small items or clean ups. I did like that I can use it when I need to fill my pool water line back up because the water from those water hose is going straight into the pool so it’s like knocking out two birds with one stone. It’s definitely something to keep in you collection of pool equipment at home.
customer_reviews.author: IE8

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a small inground pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a small inground pool with hose access right next to the pool. Works great! Was tired of fighting with vacuum connected to the filter that never worked right and was so hard to move around. This is light but sturdy and works perfectly! It sucks everythng right up. I saw in another review that a stocking in the mesh bag would help trap sandy bits, so I will try that soon but it’s collected a ton so far! Great price, too! Pic isn’t the best but it’s full of gunk. Have gotten even more since!
customer_reviews.author: cshimer310

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good service.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy all around. This item is exactly like what I had years ago. Except for the somewhat flimsy pole, which I can overcome, because both vaccuums have the same pole attachments, it is a great product. I don't have a huge pool, only 9x18 above ground. I needed a vacuum a bit smaller, at least the catch bag, than the one I have. The packing box was crushed but the vacuum was in good shape. The Amazon driver asked my wife to check the item before he left. Overall a great experience by the manufacturer, seller and Amazon. It is rare when all 3 providers jell smoothly like that.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small shallow pools
customer_reviews.text: We have an Intex pool, I want to say the 15 foot maybe the 10. It's very small and we use it to suntan and to cool off this summer. We needed something to grab the dirt and debris off the bottom of the pool. This vacuum is PERFECT. Though I wish it had come with a metal pole, I attach it to our garden hose and the hose itself suffices as the pool since our pool isn't very deep. The easiest way I've found to use it is while I'm in the pool. The mesh bag that is attached to the end collects with dirt, bugs, and debris like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool vac at a really affordable price
customer_reviews.text: For as low priced as this is, it works extremely well. We have a small pool for our kids, about 900 gallons, and keeping it clean was tough. Kids get in and out and the small filter pump plus skimming was not enough. Bought this and was extremely surprised with how well it works for being so inexpensive. It's easy to put together (there is a YouTube video link in the sale description the shows you exactly how to assemble it) and it's pretty sturdy. The suction works well and it's easy to clean when not in use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz T

customer_reviews.title: I was highly skeptical but I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I had my doubts this thing would work for $35.... Well I was wrong. This little gadget works better than most that are at least two times as much. After a couple of days rain I snapped this thing together and took it to the pool. I was highly impressed to say the least. I don't have trees in my yard so I can't attest to how well it picks up leaves but the little bits and bugs of whatever that falls in your pool and settles to the bottom, it picks it up great. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SAUCE.  WOULD BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. I didn’t even need a manual to figure it out. There will be an EXTRA WHITE PIECE its a universal part! Very easy to use. Connect hose once assembled. Collects a lot of trash. Found that it was easier to hold the hose while attached to the brush and walk with it while skimming the bottom. For the price this is an AMAZING PRODUCT so glad we purchased. It def. takes effort it doesn’t run its self. But that’s why you’re saving money. And for us having a pool up for only 8 months out of the year that’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: It works GREAT. I read reviews before buying it and all ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and used it in our 10x30 pool. It works GREAT. I read reviews before buying it and all said were surprised that this 20$ vacuum really works. Just a quick note. We make a whirlpool in our pool before getting out and much of the sediment settles in the middle and that is where we vacuum first to remove most of the dirt. Works Great....
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy RueFess

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this the other day and it arrived this afternoon. Took a few minutes to put it together as there weren't any instructions, but we got it. Hooked up the hose and let it rip. It works surprisingly well! Cleaned out our above-ground pool with the plastic liner very quickly. The bag was totally disgusting afterward, but cleaned up extremely easily. We're really pleased with this purchase. I don't think I'd want to use it on a larger pool, but a 15x15 circle was pretty quick and painless to clean. If it ends up breaking before the next swimming season, I won't have any qualms about buying this exact same vacuum again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno D. Bones

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: This vac works great, the only problem is it came in a clear plastic bag with no directions. If I hadn't had this type of vac before, I would have had no idea how to assemble it or how to make it work! the handle that comes with it is very small/cheap, but it came with an adapter to connect it to a standard pool tool handle so that wasn't a problem for me. 10 mins work and it cleaned up all the seed pods and dead critters that had sunk to the bottom of the pool! This combined with an add on skimmer and my Intex pool is going to be a lot less work this year!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions but it was pretty self explanatory, especially with the aid of the picture on Amazon. After putting it together I admit to being skeptical, however, once we hooked it up to the hose and started vacuuming our inflatable, I turned into a believer. My wife was able to clear out all the accumulated debri off the bottom of the pool in about 15 minutes. I couldn't believe how well this vacuum preformed. Would recommend to anyone with a small or inflatable pool.
customer_reviews.author: Terp86

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. This is a great little vacuum does the job. My last one took water out of the pool when vacuuming. This one actually adds water since you’re using a water hose to create suction. You will want to put something under the white bag that comes with it. Especially if you’re vacuuming up fine sand like particles. I use an old sock. Then the bag. My only complaint. I wish it had a longer handle. You will have to get in the pool to vacuum. But it does a great job !!
customer_reviews.author: Lori12547

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this but for the price I decided to try it out. My 12 year old put it together. I hooked up the house and thought this is never gonna work. Got in the pool and started "vacuuming" and I WAS AMAZED! Our pool has never looked so clean! I didn't even need to switch out bag to panty hose. It picked up EVERYTHING! I even flipped it over and used it to skim the surface. THIS IS THE VACUUM THAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR! Don't hesitate, just BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: NicoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Good Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this product. Suction is quite good and the mouth of the vacuum tool is wide enough to suck up small leaves etc. As many have noted, the product does come without a pole. It does come with a plastic clip but to this day I have absolutely no clue as to how to use it despite having other poles with skimmers etc. that use a similar clips. So to develop a pole I used a 1.5 inch PVC pipe cut to length to secure the vacuum head. Worked perfectly and with PVC completely at home in the water. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Redcatcher

customer_reviews.title: best buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of trees over our pool. The bottom of our pool looked horrible, tuns of pine needles! We didn't want to spend a lot of money on a pool vacuum. I was very happy to find this vaccum, and even happier when we got it and tried it out! Best purchase possible! We used it all summer, it cleaned the pool and was easy to use. Can't beat the price! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: coley

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm for our Inflatable Kiddie Pool with no filter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean/Vacuum our large Kiddie Pool. I liked that it was easy to use once put together. No instructions included and although it seemed easy enough, there was a part that confused me. I watched a YTube video that was listed on the Amazon product page and found out I don't even need the part. :\ Definitely works in getting up the stuff that sinks to the bottom like sand and all, and we just use a pool chlorine floater to keep water clear and safe.
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: Useless trash.  Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Being it too over a month to get to me, I received this last year after pool season ended. I just opened it to attempt to use it and what I got is all wrong. 1. No brushes in the bottom like advertised. 2. I can't attach my house because the wrong fitting was sent. 3. One of the wheels doesn't spin. This is literally useless and I will have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Good for staying on top of the little things that sink to bottom of pool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together despite lack of instructions. I used pictures from amazon. The suction is pretty good for loose materials. Stuck on algae is a bit harder to get to come up. The pole is pretty flimsy and I fear it will break easily if trying to put pressure on it to scrub harder. If will work for us for the most part since our pool in a 10 foot wide x 2.5 feet deep.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerwales

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for general use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to use in the Spa by the pool knowing i needed the garden hose for it. It seemed like a good idea at the time as i could clean up the spa and add some water at the same time. The included pole was flimsy and felt like it wanted to break apart if i pushed too hard. The whole unit itself just seemed to be made for something much smaller than a spa or even inground pool. I used it twice and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Does as needed. More powerful than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical for 28$. But it proved me wrong! Worth the money. Handle is flimsy but I used the hose to guide it more to offset the pressure on handle it picked it alllll up! My only complaint is the tiny allege particles got thru the mesh not sure if that’s truly fixable. This will totally help keep the kids 10 foot intex blow up ring pool clean. I was seriously amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie potter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Let's start out with this product did not come with any assembly directions whatsoever. There is no suction at all so to call it a vacuum is wrong. And the material it's made out of is extremely cheap. This isn't meant for a kid pool let alone an adult swimming pool
customer_reviews.author: christina s

customer_reviews.title: Small but works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really had my doubts about this working very well, but I went ahead and purchased due to the reviews. I was not disappointed! This little thing worked amazingly well for our Intex above ground pool. Although, after we hooked it all up and first turned on the water hose, it was too strong and it took the top off. After that, we turned the pressure down and it worked beautifully. It got more out of the pool than we thought was even in there. We are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Suction is weak.
customer_reviews.text: It came without instructions but I was able to figure it out. Suction is low in part because it needs a rubber washer between the hose and rig. It leaks which will reduce suction. The pole comes in 4 pieces which screw into each other and into the base unit. They tend to unscrew as you move the unit around in the spa. You also have to hold onto the hose as it tends to twist the base off the bottom. If it was weighted it might stay on the bottom better. With all that said, it did clean most of the sand off the bottom that had been tracked into the spa.
customer_reviews.author: graham

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This little device shocked me at how well it was able vacuum built up sand and other debris on the bottom of my pool! I love this mini cleaner! It was easy to set up and use and took me half the time to vacuum the pool as my larger skimmer vacuum and it did a better job! I was concerned about how much water it would add to the pool, but it was not an issue. I definitely recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is great, handle needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself works great - as others have said - such a simple concept with fantastic results. The problem I have had is the handel - because it comes in 4 pieces that screw into each other, it is weak to begin with. And then with a normal vacuuming motion the handle breaks at the weak points. I am searching for a handle that will work with the tool. i have also vacuumed with what is a very small handle now. I would recommend it even with the busted handle but would recommend wrapping the handle in full before using it and applying pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Making it easy for all

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: When the vacuum arrived, I was extremely surprised at how small it was. Whilst it is a good idea to have a pool vacuum that uses a hose, you have to remember that water is going into the pool which of course will add more water to it. The mesh bag does not keep in the sand that I was trying to vacuum, it slips through the tiny holes and defeats the object of cleaning out the pool. So far I have been unable to completely clean out the pool.
customer_reviews.author: welshchick

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Only thing is that when using a pole, it's hard to keep upright - the pole/handle is one one side, while the hose is on the opposite side; this makes it a bit tougher to keep the vacuum flat on the pool surface. The entire vacuum must be submerged for it to work correctly. It was able to pick up leaves and settled dirt just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pengy

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes value isn't always value!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got this product and went to assemble it. Unless you have a female end on your hose, you have to have an adapter kit for hoses. Got mine from Walmart for 5 bucks. Product worked great after I assembled that. This is NOT a product you can just take out of the box and use! You also need a zip tie for the hose to attach to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great vac, terrible pole/handle.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is easy to use and works great, particularly for vacuum's at this price point! Do yourself a favor and order a real handle for it. The handle it ships with is a joke! It's basically the same handle construction and quality of a "Swiffer" floor cleaner it's very short (not even 6 feet) and flimsy. That being said, I was able to make do with it for our above ground pool. Next time I'll use it with a real pole/handle. The vacuum is great and worked better than I expected for its price. Great vacuum for above ground pools! Throw away the garbage handle that comes with it and order a real one!
customer_reviews.author: Justinlegler

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: This is quite effective. I was skeptical with the negative reviews but after using it I am a believer in this product. It would be a long project to use this on a large application but for my 400 gallon fish pond it worked well. sucked up everything in site. The only thing to note is that when using it water will be added to your pond or pool so i used my pump in the pond and directed water out of the pond while using this to keep water at the desired level. I would recommend this to anyone looking to clean a small pool or pond.
customer_reviews.author: classact

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work very well for hot tubs....
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this after reading all the reviews. I did not have the same experience. I bought this to clean up my hot tub. It did not work. First the bulk of the bristles aren't on the edges of the brush, only the straight parts. So you aren't going to come close to touching any edge or curve (which is the bulk of a hot tub). Second, it didn't suck up squat. Such a waste, and I waited too long to return.
customer_reviews.author: SweetMagnolia24

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Instructions would be nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I got it for my inflatable hot tub which sits under a big tree and it works like a charm. I live in Southwest Florida so I always have so much sand in the hottub and this works great. The only negative I have is that it came with literally zero instructions. It took a bit to figure out how it goes together eventually had to Google how to put it together and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shalon

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and easy to use for our 6’x4’  inflatable pool
customer_reviews.text: This little pool vacuum is awesome. We bought it for our 6’x4’ Inflatable pool that is about 18” deep and holds roughly 200 gallons of water. We vacuum the pool once a week before the kids get in so we can collect up all the debris that has settled to the bottom. I highly recommend this if you have a little backyard pool that you don’t want to dump after every use.
customer_reviews.author: kara Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works, but the handle is crap
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up my pool bottom just fine, but the handle snapped at one of the plastic joints the first time I used it. I had to cobble together a replacement handle to use it. It was no problem to assemble, although some people might be confused because it comes with two different attachment methods, one for the included crap handle and another for using your own handle. I like that the bag has a barrel clip on it to make it easy to attach and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Worked Much Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price, my expectations were low. But, I was pleasantly surprised. This vacuum really does work well. Assembly was easy once I figured out that I did not even need the white attachment. Directions would have been helpful. The vacuum does a really good job of sucking up grit and dirt in my hot tub. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally leave a review, but I felt like this was one I wanted to so that people do not overlook this little vacuum. I searched so many vacuums and did not want to spend a fortune since I was only cleaning a 15' pool that did not cost that much. I was very impressed the first time I used this. It was very easy to set up (even with no instructions). Cleans the bottom of my 15' pool with ease. It only takes me about 10 minutes to do the entire pool and looks amazing afterwards. For the price, this vacuum really does a wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: trisammy

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised for the money you can not go wrong. There are no instructions but it's simple to put together. The only reason i didn't give it five stars is the handle is to short to use the unit from outside the swim spa which is five feet deep. If you are buying it for a standard spa the length of the handle should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions. So figuring out how to assemble was a pain. There is no comfortable way to hold/ use this. It blast water pretty bad but does pick up the dirt. The brushes are just setting there not fastened well so if you set it down with any amount of force they pop off but easily go back on.. The handle untwist as you are using it. If you are patient in sure this could work for you. But I wouldn't really suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori h.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vacuum for a Kiddie Pool!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with assembly instructions, but very easy to figure out and use. Fast ship. Lightweight! I've had no problems with it at all, and I use it every day. Good suction, it really works! Wonderful little vacuum cleaner for a small10 foot by 6 foor kiddie pool. Love it! (A bit small for a pool any larger than mine though.)
customer_reviews.author: E King

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Buy this instead of a pool sweep. You can use it easily and suck up all of the fine sediment from your pool easily. Sediment will be in the bag that is supplied with this, instead of it going into the filter. Cleaning up sediment is quicker with this than a pool sweep. The cost of this is minuscule, and doesn't use electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: I have no clue what the little white part is...a handle??
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of amazed at how great this little vacuum worked! We bought a little 2.5'x10' pool on clearance so, I wasn't going into spending a ton on stuff to clean it. I gotta say though, this little vacuum cleaned my pool in about 15 minutes. It's under trees, so you can imagine the leaves. This makes this pool SUPER easy to maintain, so when the grandkids come over they have a super clean pool to swim in! Super buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Eastland

customer_reviews.title: Works great using the same principle as the in-ground sweepers
customer_reviews.text: This works on the exact same principle the Polaris in-ground pool sweepers use. This product is 1,000 times better than the battery powered sweeper sticks because it doesn't use batteries and there are no electrical contacts that could go bad. This is EXACTLY what I had been looking for and it works as advertised! Thank you! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Texas_Mark

customer_reviews.title: Useful and works well
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Bought to clean an above ground pool that had a lot of debris and yucky stuff settled at the bottom. It worked perfectly. The bag it comes with is sturdy enough to wash and reuse. It creates a good amount of pressure for the suction part of the brush to suck up all the nasty stuff and collects it in the bag. The pole is thin and a bit of poor material but it does the job and the price is right. I am hardly with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, ok product
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to pay a lot of money for these items. And This has a nice price. Helped a lot to clean my easy intex above ground pool. Handle should be stronger because i already broke one little piece of it. But i can still use it . Now the handle is shorter though. Overall it is ok for this budget and clean good.
customer_reviews.author: Jr75

customer_reviews.title: best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: So I have a smaller above ground pool and this product fits the bill. Spending time looking to clean the bottom of this pool but didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars on a vacuum type system. I gave this product a chance and was pleasantly surprised of is overall functions. It may take a little more time to clean the bottom of the pool but worth every penny. I ordered this product with the suggested net and pole combo.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work on Dirt or Small Debris
customer_reviews.text: I bought it specifically to suck up dirt and small debris in my in ground spa, but it does neither. The bag mesh is too large and the dirt goes right through it, the only thing it sucks up is large leaves and I can get those with my pool net so what do I need this for? The quality is okay, but doesn't work as advertised. They need to put a finer mesh on it, but I didn't buy it to have to rig something up to get it to work the way it should in the first place. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really does work great — picks up leaves and teeny tiny debris as well!! I suggest using a very lightweight hose, however, bc it’s quite difficult to push around the pool otherwise. Though I’m not exactly super strong. Lol Also liked that while vacuuming the hose raised the water level of the pool, which thankfully was needed at that point. Knowing this, however, will determine whether I vacuum or not; definitely don’t want the pool to overflow lol (We have an above ground pool, 15’ round x 4’ deep.)
customer_reviews.author: NikkiNoodle1127Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Having to drain or bucket out 10% of the water before vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: Reason I did not give it a 5 star because the pain that you have to take out a few bucket full of water before using. Depending how dirty the pool is how many buckets you have to take out of the pool. 20 buckets is a minimal. If you don't do this the pool could overflow. Another flaw is the handle is too light and skinny. For a small or petite person the pressure of the water and the heavy of the hose makes it hard for them to control. I think using the adapter and buying a regular pool pole will work better. But it sucks the dirt up really well.
customer_reviews.author: James Patrick Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a summer pool you’ll probably trash come October
customer_reviews.text: Kind of self explanatory when it comes to putting together some pieces didn’t make sense but I didn’t feel they were necessary. Pole is pretty flimsy but might have my husband figure out a new pole that’s more durable. The bag itself works great but I put a cut up panty hose or white sock inside of it to suck up any algae or very fine debris.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for what I was looking for. Wanted something for touch ups on my in ground pool between full vacuums. Considered other Spa/pool vacs that ran by battery or needed to be manually pumped but was turned off by reviews. Decided for the price I’d give this a try. Worked great. Yes, there are no directions with it but if it takes more than 30 seconds to figure it out and put it together you’ve got other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Crusn

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for smaller pools. LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED IT! It's perfect for smaller pools. I HIGHLY recommend this product for smaller, shallow pools or hot tubs. It has kept our grandsons pools (2) clean. We have a toddler pool for our smaller grandbabies and a shallow 12' for our teens. Its has kept both pools clean and slime free thru this summer. We didnt need to empty either pool. We only added a more fresh water. (and chlorine of course) YEA! Excellent price for this small product...that does a monster job. Wish it was around when we were kids.
customer_reviews.author: S. Teply

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum but get a different pole
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great at cleaning the bottom of my pool. I have tried others but they did not work as well as this one. However only bad thing about it is the pole is not very strong and after a few uses the pole broke right where the blue plastic screws into the next section. I had to get another more sturdy pole.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Doty

customer_reviews.title: Works great, simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: Simple but effective device. If you are mechanically inclined it’s easy to assemble. Actually it only goes together one way, but as others said, no instructions. Works well. Seems a little fragile but gets the job done very well. Use the brush pole insert...the included pole assembly unscrews too easily during use and is a little small anyway when you have a garden hose weighing the thing down.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth the purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled will how well this vacuum worked for our pool. It took me a minute to figure it how the hose was supposed to push water through as there were no directions with the parts which is the only reason I’m giving 4 stars instead of 5. Overall, GREAT product and definitely worth the purchase. It took less than 30 min to clean the bottom of my 18ft pool!
customer_reviews.author: Will Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum look flimsy and miniscule when you get it, but it works pretty well. Better for very small ponds where everything is reachable by hand from the edges. It's really quite effective, but pay attention to the instructions, and clean out the filter bag often.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Ness

customer_reviews.title: Get their orders out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Same thing you can get at walmart for $16, tried to cancel this order a couple hours after I placed it so they are very fast at getting the order out, which is cool unless ofcourse, you try to cancel. Product works well for our 1000 gallon pool. Would order it again if walmart was out of them...but it does cost a little more. Worth the extra couple dollars to avoid walmart though lol
customer_reviews.author: anna marie

customer_reviews.title: Handle breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: The first time I needed it for extensive use on my 12 foot pool, the pole broke for the handle!! It has okay suction power and is good for leaves (I was using it for algae though and not sure how much was staying in the bag) m. Useless if the pole breaks that easily though!
customer_reviews.author: JameRoo

customer_reviews.title: You need a garden hose.
customer_reviews.text: That's vacuum was perfect for my intex easy set 12 ft round pool. It did the job needed to clean the pool of debris and pollen that settled to the bottom. The price was perfect too. Just attach your hose and get cleaning. Super simple to set up, use and rinse out the bag.
customer_reviews.author: fmulder

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well this worked. I have a best way 12x30 pool and it took me about 15mins to get all the debris at the bottom of the pool I couldn’t get with the skimmer. It came in unmarked packaging with no directions. Wasn’t too difficult to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well. Pole could be stronger.
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well. One of the pole segments broke at the plastic thread point when I shook the water off of the device after I finished cleaning, so I now have only three pole segments. If your pool is full of water, it will get more full as you clean, a problem I solved by using a FluentPower FPC200C submersible pump (green pump in photo which I ordered separately from Amazon) in order to recirculate the pool water instead of a hose tap.
customer_reviews.author: neAndrewthal

customer_reviews.title: pretty good device for a pinch cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I thought it worked pretty well. It does take time and it is small but works pretty well for a 20 dollar device. Now ill have to go in my inground pool to get the deeper end stuff but in a pinch when ur pool guy disappeared I can do it myself to stretch the season to the end of September. Very easy to assemble the connection piece does come off but working w it and having patience will go far
customer_reviews.author: jon r baer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but kinda small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for vacuuming up the little bit of debris that collects in my pool. I live in Arizona so this isn't really a big deal (I went over a year without even bothering to do it). The vacuum worked fine, but because it's so small it took a long time to catch every bit of debris. I ended up buying one of the larger round leaf vacuums that seems like overkill in my case but makes it so much quicker to get everything.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The coolest pool tool we found
customer_reviews.text: We have a 6-peraon inflatable jacuzzi and could not figure out how to remove hair and dirt without dumping all the water out. This solved all our problems, it picks up every speck of dirt, hair, bugs from the bottom of the jacuzzi. The suction is great, the only downside is that it adds water to the pool as you clean, which is better to deal with than dirt you can't remove! Just dump the water out and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works amazingly well! We bought one of those blow up hot tubs here on amazon and the kids get dirt and sand in the bottom all the time. I needed something simple and cheap to vacuum it out. This is perfect! Works with a hose so you have to use it when you want to fill up the hot tub. I don’t entirely get the science behind it but I love it! Does the job!
customer_reviews.author: WmachIII

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This item works much better than I thought it would. I have an Intex easy set 10 x 30 pool and this vacuum cleans my pool very quickly. The mesh bag catches minut particles of dirt and sand. It no time my pool looks fantastic. I highly recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Blueyecowgirl

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FIR THE POOL!!
customer_reviews.text: This little pump is AMAZING! We were blown away by how awesome it is. Picked up pebbles and a rock! It is so easy to use we love it. Just need to find out where to get a replacement sock as they all wear out sooner or later. It doesn’t come with a pole but fits on both that we have.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a inflatable pool, holds about 300 gal. It gets some grit on bottom. This does get the loose debris off the pool bottom. Its okay to use, fairly easy but feels flimsy, so I handle it carefully. It did not come with instructions on how to put together. It is simple to figure out once I realized it had extra parts! I think for a different handle style? Anyway it works good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me!
customer_reviews.text: Only one use so far but I’d say it works! My 7 year old put it together - there were no directions in our box but I did watch a video to make sure it was correctly put together. I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of fairly small particles that it picked up. I didn’t want to have to mess with a filter vacuum because I’m guessing our little intex filter isn’t strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: NHmom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to use!
customer_reviews.text: I want to preface this by saying that I rarely write reviews, couldn’t resist this time. I just finished using this pool vac and I am astounded by it’s performance! Generally I put off cleaning the pool as it has been a time consuming arduous task. This time it took a fraction of the time, which pleased me. The brushes losened the dirt and the huge debris bag could have held 3x the amount, possibly more. The only drawback was that it didn’t fit on my extension pool. I found another use for duct tape!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have tool for smaller pools!
customer_reviews.text: I had to pause the assembly instructional video several times to keep up, but when it was done, the video proved to be very helpful. We have a 10' above ground with the air bladder on top. It was a bit challenging to maneuver the hose around the bladder, but overall, I'm VERY HAPPY with this vacuum. The attached picture is from one-through and it got all the particles off the bottom that have been lingering for weeks because our pump didn't pull them through the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Doug -n- Beth

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I need it to do!
customer_reviews.text: We have a diving pool with two drains in the deep end that often gets small rocks or other debris stuck in them. The regular vacuum does not do well around the drains, and the skimmer net is a total pain. We usually end up having to dive to remove the junk, but that is not always a great option, especially in the winter. This little vacuum works perfectly! It is easy to set up, and the suction is strong enough to pick up the small pieces. I highly recommend this product if you have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: TamiN

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for a small pool
customer_reviews.text: We got this to help keep our 10ft pool clean. It was a bit of a pain to assemble as one of the handle pieces was bent badly. The supplied handle is pretty flimsy and hard to control. However, the vacuum works great and sucks up all of the debris and sand my kids track in.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Find the YouTube video to learn how to put it together. It works. I did take another reviewer's recommendation and used the end of a pair of tights because the bag that came with it didn't catch the smallest debris (probably better for leaves than dirt).
customer_reviews.author: torifa

customer_reviews.title: This vac works great, the bottom of my pond was pretty gross ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical, but for $20 I gave it a try. All I can say is "WOW". This vac works great, the bottom of my pond was pretty gross after the winter, and using a net just didn't cut it. Within 10 minutes the bag was full of muck, and after 3 bag cleanings the pond looks fantastic. The only thing I had to do was pick a snail out of the bag before I threw the muck into the garden. Love this vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: PoolSupplyTown Pool Spa Jacuzzi Pond Mini Jet...
customer_reviews.text: The handle is very flimsy and it does not clean as well as the vacuum I purchased later. The bag comes loose very easily. It is now just a dust collector, but it was cheap. Guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great pool vacuum for small pools
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how well this thing works! We have a 7 ft. Intex pool that sits under a tree and much kids love to run through the mulch and dirt dragging in debris with them This picked up even tiny little dirt particles. Yes the handle is flimsy but it's such a small pool it doesnt make a difference. And like others said no directions but I had it together in under 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Falato

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This things works great, it uses the power from the garden hose to suck up the dirt and derby so you know it’s not going to lose it’s suction over time. It’s so easy to use our 7 year old can use it.. accept for the middle section because her arms are to short. Only wish we would have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: C DelaCruz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT NO MATTER YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR AND IN THIS CASE IF IT WAS A DOLLAR ITD BE TOO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: I disliked it more than I can express. I actually got it refunded before I received it. Delivery time is not what it says. It came in a colored baggie, no directions, and the picture of it is so misleading. Mine didn't have brushes and they weren't missing just not there period. I used it for an inflatable family center. Approximately 7 x7 . It put water in so fast there was no way to vacuum without having to drain it at the same time
customer_reviews.author: DOMKAZY

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works fine and does a good job of cleaning the bottom of our wading pool. The problem is that it was shipped from China and took around 30 days to be delivered. Not a great deal in the middle of the summer as dirt is accumulating on the bottom of the pool. I ended up having to buy another one from a different vendor. The extended delivery time is unacceptable and not what I would expect from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is PERFECT for a hot tub. I was able to reach everywhere I needed with the extension pole and not get wet. It picked up small debris and leaves that had settled on the bottom. I am very pleased with this product and the price can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to get nickel- and quarter-size leaves out of my fountain, which has a smooth, flat concrete floor. This thing basically did nothing. Perhaps the water pressure to my hose is too low...that's the only excuse I can think of if it does, in fact, work for as many people as say it does.
customer_reviews.author: D OC

customer_reviews.title: High quality, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is amazing! Picked up every little thing with ease. I used a mans sock in place of the net for the fine particle on the bottom like I read in other reviews. It worked perfectly. I definately recommend this product. It is made of very thick, durable plastic. Will be of use for years to come. It does fits the standard pool pole.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy pole
customer_reviews.text: The pole broke on the very first cleaning. The pole is not sturdy so be careful not to press too hard when cleaning. Since the pole is multiple attaching pieces we can still use the pole it's just shorter. The cleaner actually works well and my son will dive down and not use the pole and just guide it with the hose.
customer_reviews.author: 3G

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it keeps falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it works. It picks up from large leaves to small debris. Easy to assemble and, with practice, easy to use. What I hate about it is that it falls apart so easily. I put it together and I could tell that it’s very flimsy. The pole is not firm much and the parts detach from one another all the time. Great concept, but buy something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, very easy to set up and it works even picked up sand from my above the ground pool without stressing. I absolutely recommend this product. I shared the link to all my friends with above the ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great sub in a pinch!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large inground pool and my robotic vacuum had to go to the shop for repairs. We had 2 pool parties within 5 days and tons of leaves and dirt on the bottom. I didn't want to spend a bunch of money for something temporary so I decided to try this. I'm so glad I did!! It worked perfect, was super easy, and didn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Katfish Smith

product_meta.title: PoolSupplyTown Pool Spa Jet Vacuum Cleaner w/ Brush, Ideal for Above Ground and Inflatable Pool, Spa, Pond, Waterfall, No Pump-Filter System and Electric Power Required (Use with A Telescopic Pool Pole, Not Included)
product_meta.description: Size:Pool Jet VacuumEasy to use: Simply assemble the vacuum cleaner together and connect it to your garden hose. The water pressure from your garden hose creates a venturi action which sucks up debris and leaves into the vacuum’s collection bag. NO PUMP-FILTER circulation system and NO ELECTRIC POWER required. It is PORTABLE and HANDY to use. Ideal for above ground and inflatable pool, spa, waterfall, fountain, and pond. It is also perfect for vacuuming inground spa and small pool. ***Watch this video link for assembly and operation (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h-kDzRiNZaM) for reference***. Note: This item does not come with poles, you will need a telescopic pole to use the vacuum.
feature_bullets: For assembly and operation, watch this video link (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h-kDzRiNZaM) for reference
This item DOES NOT come with pole. You need a standard 1-1/4" telescopic pool pole to vacuum (Not included)
Use water pressure from your garden hose to suck up debris. It is portable and handy to use
The water pressure from your hose will create a venturi effect,drawing leaves and other debris into the collection bag
Ideal for above ground and inflatable pool, spa, waterfall, fountain, and pond. No pump-filter circulation system and electric power required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,168 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
